actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadow fey makes two Dagger or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If the forest hunter is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the hunter instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half the damage if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The shadow fey has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Forest and Urban Hunter
special_abilities.desc: The forest hunter has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks to find and track Beasts and Humanoids.

special_abilities.name: Charging Archer
special_abilities.desc: If the forest hunter moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target after hitting the target with a Longbow attack, the forest hunter can make one Dagger attack against the target as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the shadow fey has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
